product_name: Louis Garneau Palomar Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Strategically placed mesh on the men's Palomar Bike Jersey from Louis Garneau keeps you vented and cool as you go for the gold. Wicking, fast-drying polyester has ventilating mesh panels under the arms, on the sleeves and at back of neck. Full-length front zipper; 3 back pockets and 1 mesh pocket. Multimedia pocket allows for headphone cords to be channelled inside the jersey. Tab on the back lets you attach a mini-light (not included) for added safety. Reflective piping on the back and reflective hits on the front enhance visibility in low light. Louis Garneau Palomar Bike Jersey for men features elastic at the hem and flatlock seams for comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Strategically placed mesh on the men's Palomar Bike Jersey from Louis Garneau keeps you vented and cool as you go for the gold.
